title: Genesis Decision Record
description: A structured record of an AI or human-AI decision following the Genesis Protocol.

decision_id.description: Unique identifier for this decision record.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the decision was made.

agent_identity.description: Agent or human identifier (e.g. Skynet / ElmatadorZ).

context.description: Environmental, social, economic, or system context.

problem_statement.description: The exact question or problem being addressed.

first_principles.description: First principles used to reason about the problem.

assumptions.description: Explicit assumptions made due to uncertainty.

risk_assessment.description: Downside risks, failure modes, and mitigation logic.

refusal_check.description: Whether any failure case triggered a refusal condition.

confidence_level.description: Declared confidence level (0â€“1) to avoid false certainty.
